summary: A fashionable, light armor eyepatch for shady characters. It doesn\'t replace any models in the game. You can craft it at a forge or buy it at Grelka\'s shop in Riften!
descriptionHtml:
*** IMPORTANT *** 

This mod was made before the Creation Kit came out and therefore might be incompatible with other mods or create other issues. 

As I\'m no longer able to work on this mod myself, I recommend downloading the updated version made by [i]Sharlikran[/i]:  

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26230#content]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26230#content[/url]

If you like it, please make sure to leave him an endorsement for his work! Thank you :)

____________________________________________________________________________________________

BANDIT\'S EYEPATCH v1.2.3 
by Ceekay9

A fashionable, light armor eyepatch for shady characters. It doesn\'t replace any models in the game. You can craft it at a forge or buy it at Grelka\'s shop in Riften!

================================================================

IMPORTANT NOTE:

Currently works on human and kjahiit ONLY.

----------------------------------------------------------------

Changelog:

v1.2.3

- item can now be worn with helmets and hoods

v1.2.2

- made impovements to file structure, it now uses one .bsa file instead of multiple folders

v1.2.1

- added right eye version

v1.2
- added kajiit support 
- you can now craft the item with 1 leather and 1 strip
- item is now recognized as light armor so you benefit from the perk
- enabled enchantments 
- enabled upgrading


v1.1
- fixed reflection bug
- added ingame preview
- adjusted the weight to a more realistic value
- lowered the price of the item significantly

----------------------------------------------------------------

Installation instructions:

1) Copy the \"Data\" folder into your Skyrim folder, which is most likely
C:\\program files (x86)\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

*note: for 32bit Windows users it might be
C:\\program files\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

2) Start Skyrim. In the launcher, click on \"data files\" and make sure \"banditseyepatch.esp\" is checked.

3) Play the game, enjoy :)

----------------------------------------------------------------
To uninstall, you need to delete the following files: 

- banditseyepatch.esp and banditseyepatch.bsa from the skyrim/Data directory.

================================================================

THANK YOU FOR DOWNLOADING
author: Ceekay9

files.name: Bandit Eyepatch
files.changelogHtml: item can now be worn with helmets and hoods
